response.explain: Since this is the first step, there is no previous error or code to explain. The task is to put the oyster (huitre) on the stockpot and cook it. The oyster is currently inside the fridge, which is closed. The first step would be to open the fridge.
response.subtask:
(1) Open the fridge
(2) Take the oyster out of the fridge
(3) Put the oyster on the stockpot
(4) Cook the oyster
response.code:
